label: Percy, Diana M.  2017. A new endemic psyllid genus, Stevekenia gen. nov. (Hemiptera: Psylloidea,  Triozidae), from the Hawaiian Islands with two new and rare species on  threatened host plants in the endemic genus Nothocestrum (Solanaceae). Zootaxa 4286(3): 370–380.
value: Percy, Diana M.  2017. A new endemic psyllid genus, Stevekenia gen. nov. (Hemiptera: Psylloidea,  Triozidae), from the Hawaiian Islands with two new and rare species on  threatened host plants in the endemic genus Nothocestrum (Solanaceae). Zootaxa 4286(3): 370–380.
title: A new endemic psyllid genus, Stevekenia gen. nov. (Hemiptera: Psylloidea, Triozidae), from the Hawaiian Islands with two new and rare species on threatened host plants in the endemic genus Nothocestrum (Solanaceae)
